description: Initiates a request to compile the specified type of information of the deployed environment.  Setting the InfoType to tail compiles the last lines from the application server log files of every Amazon EC2 instance in your environment.   Setting the InfoType to bundle compresses the application server log files for every Amazon EC2 instance into a .zip file. Legacy and .NET containers do not support bundle logs.   Use RetrieveEnvironmentInfo to obtain the set of logs.  Related Topics    RetrieveEnvironmentInfo
